summary: This document is an email chain from July 28, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It reports that Epstein was being taken off psychological observation, described him as psychologically stable, and noted his complaints of numbness in his right arm and neck, as well as a noisy toilet in his cell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who is the subject of the email chain regarding his psychological observation status and physical complaints.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psychological Observation
events.description: An email reports that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with staff describing him as psychologically stable.

keyFacts: On July 28, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was reported as being taken off psychological observation and described as 'psychologically stable' by jail staff.
Epstein complained of numbness in his right arm and neck, and an inability to make a fist with his right hand on the morning of July 28, 2019.
Epstein reported that a noisy toilet in his cell had been running for 45 minutes the previous night, and he was to be moved to another cell if the issue persisted.
